item.title: Eclipse Hono – Eclipse Hono : Connect. Command. Control.
item.description: The open source response to closed and proprietary IoT solutions is called Eclipse Hono!

item.description: With Industry 4.0 and Smart Manufacturing the need of communication and interoperability of machines and the Internet of Things (IoT) became bigger and bigger …
